column20: Usage
Turns the user's body into rubber, giving them the power to stretch, bounce, and inflate, as well as making them immune to electricity and near impervious to blunt-force attacks and bullets.
Allows the user to split their body into separate pieces, which they can manipulate and levitate through the air. It also makes them immune to slashing attacks.
It makes the user's body smooth and slippery, which in turn makes most attacks and objects slide off their body, protecting the user from harm in most situations.
It allows the user to make any part of their body explode, whether it be their limbs, hair, mucus, even breath or cough.
It allows the user to change their weight from 1 to 10,000 kilograms without, in any way, affecting the overall size of their body.
It allows the user to replicate and sprout pieces of their body from the surface of any object or living thing.
It allows the user to create large quantities of candle wax from their body and control it.
It allows the user to eat otherwise-inedible objects, then later manifesting them from their body.
It allows the user to turn themselves into a physical double of anyone they touch.
It enables the user's body to gain characteristics of a steel blade to attack opponents with.
It allows the user to grow spikes on any part of their body, and turn any body part entirely into a spike.
It allows the user to bind their foes in iron shackles created by the user's body.
It allows the user to turn their limbs into springs.
It allows the user to create and manipulate strings.
It allows the user to emit beams which temporarily slow down their target.
It allows the user to create doors through anything they touch.
It allows the user to emit and control soap and bubbles that can not only clean off dirt but can also "clean off" power.
It allows the user to conjure ghosts.
It enhances the user's soul to the point where they resurrect after their first death, allowing them to live a second time and to use several other soul-based abilities.
It gives the user the ability to manifest and control shadows of living creatures, including their own, as physical and tangible forms. The user, becoming a ruler of shadows.
It gives its user the ability to turn themselves and whatever they touch (living or nonliving) invisible.
It grants the ability to repel anything via paws permanently manifested on the user's palms.
It allows the user to manipulate the ages of people or objects.
It allows the user to create magnetic forces and use them to control metal.

It's ability is to create a spherical domain, inside of which the user can freely rearrange, dismantle (without harm), and generally remodel/restructure anything and anyone (themself included) in a "surgical" way.
It allows the user to become a living fortress, making the user a castle human.
It allows the user to create and manipulate straw at will, with the straw having damage-redirecting properties.
It allows the user to transform parts of their body into musical instruments and play music with a variety of destructive effects.
It allows a range of attacks which use emotions of love, lust or adoration to transform opponents into stone.
It grants the user the ability to produce and control different types of poison, as well as grants immunity to all forms of poison.
It grants the user the ability to create a variety of special hormones that can alter the recipient's body in any way the user desires.
It allows the user to transform parts of their body into scissors and cut solid objects as if they were paper.
It allows the user to create vibrations, or "quakes".
It allows the user to transform their body into diamond.
It allows the user to literally "wash and hang out to dry" people and objects as if they were clothes.
It allows the user to levitate themselves and non-living things into the air.
It allows its user to drastically enlarge their body.
It makes the user capable of aiming at whichever "target" he decides upon from any location and at any time with anything at ease.
It allows the user to create clothing and other apparel out of leaves or stones by visualizing them.
It allows the user to transform living people into toys, and erase memories of their existence from others. It has a secondary side effect of granting the eater eternal youth.
It gives the user the ability to change their body parts into any weapon.
It allows the user to create and control mucus.
It allows the user to create and manipulate gravitational force.
It allows the user to generate barriers.
It grants the user the ability to stitch things together and un-stitch them like if nothing had happened.
It allows the user to see through everything and read the minds of others.
It allows the user to cause their own body or any inorganic object they touch to rupture and explode.
It allows the user to swim in the ground or walls.
It allows the user to make their body and any object they touch become flat and flexible, letting solid objects ripple, billow, and flutter like a piece of cloth or a flag.
It allows the user to merge with and manipulate stone.
It allows the user to generate ink from their body and use a painting brush to turn images created with that ink into three-dimensional, lifelike objects.
It allows the user to create a soundproof field and to cancel all noises.
It grants the user the ability to heal any wound or injury through the use of liquid that comes from the user's body, such as tears.
It allows the user to create and control scrolls at will, which have special properties including storing objects and generating drawings.
It allows the user to interact with and manipulate souls.
It allows the user to create mirrors which can reflect attacks or appearances.
It allows the user to create and manipulate candy at will.
It allows the user to generate and manipulate biscuits at will.
It allows the user to summon a genie from their body.
It allows the user to create, control, and transform into mochi.
It allows its user to drain liquid from both living and non-living things by wringing them, as well as absorb liquid into themselves and their weapons.
It allows the user to turn people's memories into strips of film and manipulate them.
It allows the user to emanate heat from their body.
It allows the user to turn objects into food.
It allows the user to freely move and shape the ground as though it was malleable like clay.
It allows the user to encourage and rally other people to awaken their latent potential to fight.
It allows the user to create "dango" from their cheeks that can tame animals and those of part-animal nature.
It allows the user to send themselves and others forward in time.
It allows the user to mature and decay anything they touch.
It allows the user to afflict others with diseases.
It allows the user to teleport themselves and others from place to place.
It grants its user incredible strength.
It allows the user's brain to expand indefinitely with new knowledge.
It grants the ability to merge with an island's environment and manipulate it.
It makes the user a liquor human.
It allows the user to use whips to command anything they hit.
It allows the user to create, control, and transform into smoke at will.
It allows the user to create, control, and transform into sand at will.
It allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire at will.
It grants the power to create, control, and become lightning at will.
It allows the user to create, control, and transform into ice at will.
It allows the user to create, control, and transform into darkness at will.
It allows the user to create, control, and transform into light at will.
It allows the user to create, control, and transform into magma at will.
It allows the user to create, control, and transform into soot at will.
It allows the user to create, control, and transform into mud at will.
It  allows the user to create, control, and transform into gas at will.
It allows the user to create, control, and transform into snow at will.
It grants the power to create, control, and transform into flora at will.

column15: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Bison
column20: It allows its user to transform into a full bison or a half-bison hybrid at will.

column15: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Giraffe
column20: It allows its user to transform into a giraffe hybrid and a full giraffe at will,
It allows its user to transform into a human hybrid or a human at will.

column15: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Daibutsu
column20: It allows its user to transform into a Daibutsu (a giant gold Buddha) at will.

column15: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Onyudo
column20: It allows its user to transform into an onyudo, a large monk yokai, at will.

column15: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Nika
column20: It allows one to transform into the legendary "Sun God" Nika and gain his rubbery attributes.

column15: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Falcon
column20: It allows its user to transform into a falcon hybrid and a full falcon at will.

column15: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Phoenix
column20: It allows its user to transform into a phoenix and phoenix hybrid at will.

column15: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Albatross
column20: It allows its user to transform into an albatross hybrid and a full albatross at will.

column15: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Wolf
column20: It  allows its user to transform into a wolf hybrid and a full wolf at will.

column15: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Kyubi no Kitsune
column16: Dog-Dog Fruit, Model: Nine Tailed Fox
column20: It allows the user to transform into a nine-tailed fox.

column15: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Okuchi no Makami
column20: It allows the user to transform into a hybrid and full version of an ancient wolf deity at will.

column15: Uma Uma no Mi, Model: Pegasus
column20: It allows its user to transform into a Pegasus hybrid and a full Pegasus at will.

column15: Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Leopard
column20: It allows its user to transform into a leopard hybrid and a full leopard at will.

column15: Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Saber Tiger
column20: It allows the user to transform into a hybrid and full version of a saber-toothed tiger at will.

column15: Zou Zou no Mi, Model: Mammoth
column20: It allows the user to transform into a mammoth hybrid and full mammoth at will.

column15: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Allosaurus
column20: It allows the user to transform into an allosaurus hybrid and a full allosaurus at will.

column15: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Spinosaurus
column20: It allows the user to transform into a spinosaurus hybrid and a full spinosaurus at will.

column15: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Pteranodon
column20: It allows the user to transform into a pteranodon hybrid and a full pteranodon at will.

column15: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Brachiosaurus
column20: It allows the user to transform into a brachiosaurus hybrid and a full brachiosaurus at will.

column15: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Pachycephalosaurus
column20: It allows the user to transform into a hybrid and full version of a pachycephalosaurus at will.

column15: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Triceratops
column20: It allows the user to transform into a hybrid and full version of a triceratops at will.

column15: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: King Cobra
column20: It allows its user to turn into a king cobra hybrid and a full king cobra at will. It can also give the user the ability to create and spit venom.

column15: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Anaconda
column20: It allows its user to transform into an anaconda hybrid and a full anaconda at will.

column15: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Yamata no Orochi
column20: It allows the user to transform into a hybrid and full version of the Yamata no Orochi, an eight-headed snake or dragon in Japanese mythology.

column15: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu
column20: It allows its user to transform into a hybrid and full Azure Dragon at will.

column15: Kumo Kumo no Mi, Model: Rosamygale Grauvogeli
column20: It allows the user to transform into a hybrid and full version of a rosamygale grauvogeli, an ancient species of spider.
It allows the user to become a turtle hybrid and full turtle at will.
It turns the user's body composition into that of an egg, which if cracked open will cause the user to regenerate into a stronger body that features more and more chicken-like features each time.
It allows its user to transform into a bat hybrid and a full bat at will.
